instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-2879</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> board not booting ! white led keeps on
threads.message: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-2979</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> board, fan spin regular speed, there is cpu-vcore.... do not  not boot.. thats led white light   (right by the hd) keeps on when press power button ...noting on scree. with external screen noting on the screen too... any help
